channel.title: New Job on John, Complected
channel.description: Recent content in New Job on John, Complected

item.title: I love it when a plan comes together
item.description: So I thought these posts would happen more regularly; it’s just been intense getting to know so many people. Bringing together three teams distributed across our campuses has been a great deal of fun. Each is unique, with its distinct strengths and culture. Today I shared our strategy for IT across the group. While I get nervous speaking in front of people, I love these moments. It’s the big reveal of the analysis and work that has been amassed over the last 6 months.

item.title: An Incident and an Attack
item.description: It’s been a mad week at one of the sites, we experienced a cyber attack and the fact it’s been in the first couple of months

item.title: An Entertaining Start
item.description: So at the beginning of the month I began a new adventure as an employee for the first time in 7 years, starting as the new Group Director for IT with Eastern Colleges Group. I really am excited about this role, there is so much to get to grips with, so many areas in which IT directly contributes to the eduction delivered by the colleges. I’ll be posting sporadically (if I ever get this blog published) with how the role is going and the challeges that we face in ensuring that the systems keep working.
